name: Bed Simulator
description:
Bed Simulator.
Do you want to say "What next? Simulator of brushing your teeth? " We have already made that, no need to worry!

Bed Lying Simulator is a quality short experience with a philosophical subtext
Lie on a bed and see what happens. You can lie on a bed immersively in a realistic location.
The game features real time environment rusting, character weight gain, day/night/seasons system, calendar, time that
incrementally increases its speed.
Game includes smooth first person animations. Graphics are of a good quality for indie.
In the end, there would be a sad cut-scene.
It is a short(however,the game may feel like it is very long), yet complete experience with a solid concept and a nice consistent level of quality.

Features:

-Lie on a bed

-First person view

-Character has body

-Quality animations

-Day/night cycle with seasons

-Dynamic environment rusting
